1: I joyfully praise the name of the Lord.
2: I celebrate my connection in a sacred and supportive community.
3: I celebrate goodness and find joy in singing praises.
4: I am valued and cherished as a unique treasure.
5: I recognize greatness and find comfort in higher wisdom.
6: Everything I do brings about goodness in all places.
7: The elements work together to nourish and energize the earth.
8: I witness nature's power bringing justice to all.
9: I see great signs and wonders all around me.
10: I celebrate the strength found in overcoming challenges.
11: I embrace the strength and unity in overcoming challenges together.
12: I receive a beautiful inheritance in my community.
13: Your name inspires remembrance and joy for all time.
14: The divine presence guides and supports all of us.
15: I find joy in creation and the beauty of craftsmanship.
16: I choose to listen and see the truth around me.
17: Listening with intent enriches my understanding and connection.
18: I trust in what empowers and uplifts me.
19: I celebrate and honor the divine presence in my life.
20: I bless and honor the LORD with reverence and joy.
21: I praise the LORD for His presence among us.
